name: King of the Dead
description:
King of the Dead is a dark 2.5 D platformer with elements of RPG and Slashers, which takes place in the ancient town of Delver You will find a dark atmosphere of the dark castle, which is full of dangers and cruel enemies.

Talk to the locals to find out what happened while you were in the cell. Solve various tasks that will meet you on the way.

You have to go the hard way from a homeless prisoner to the great warrior of all time. You will be pursued by the gloomy atmosphere of the dark castle, battles with evil spirits and dangerous traps.

Take the plunge and plunge into darkness!
